name: Melayu (Benji Savage)
description:
Melayu is a chill, exploration-platformer about exploring an abandoned island and reconnecting with your cultural roots. Work together with a spirit flower to gain access to special platforming abilities and restore the island to its former glory! Heavily inspired by Southeast Asia and the Mediterranean (where several of our members are from), we hope you can relax and decompress as you play our game :)

Made in 5 months as part of Hanze University's (Groningen) Gamelab program. Winner of the Wonderful Technology, Best Sound & Student Choice awards!

Controls: WASDMoveSpaceJump
Space (Hold)Glide (Unlockable)EscPausePPhoto Mode (Freeze Time)

For the surf_Melayu version, hold W and use your Mouse to turn for optimal results.

CheatsSpam "1" to teleport upwards. The Team:
  • Alessandro Terlizzi: Technical Artist, Designer, Level Designer
  • Alex Dubarenco: Developer
  • Bastian Bottani: 3D Artist
  • Benjamin Earl Savage: Designer, Level Designer, Developer
  • Igor Przybyła: Character Artist, 3D Artist
  • Michaela Blaauw: Designer, 2D Artist, Texture Artist
  • Janrinke Bruinsma: Composer, Sound Designer
  • Nóra Takács: Composer
